about_the_game:
Darkwoulfe's Token Pack Vol25 - Things that go Bump Pack 1


This token pack consist of 24 uniquely designed, 3D rendered VTT tokens, depicting various creatures of the night (Vampires, Skeletons, Hell Hounds, and Werewolves). These tokens are suitable for use with any fantasy roleplaying game and are optimized for virtual table top (VTT) play. Darkwoulfe's token packs help you fill your game session with character!

These tokens are suitable for use with any fantasy roleplaying game and are optimized for virtual table top (VTT) play. Darkwoulfe's token packs help you fill your game session with character!

This Token Pack includes:

  • 5 Ghostly Spirits
  • 2 Hell Hounds
  • Igor
  • Skeletal Archer
  • Skeletal Axeman
  • Skeletal Cleric
  • Skeletal Fighter
  • 2 Skeletal Guardians
  • Skeletal Warrior
  • 2 Vampire Lords
  • Vampire Matron
  • Vampiress
  • 5 Werewolves

Converted by: James Holloway

Released on February 03, 2017. Designed for Fantasy Grounds version 3.2.2 and higher.

Requires: An active subscription or a one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds full or ultimate license and any ruleset.

  • Memory: 1 GB RAM

  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

  • Sound Card: N/A
